Ref: CXP070/2023

Criteria:

  • Relevant Commercial Degree e.g., BCom Marketing or related
  • Min. 10 years experience managing and leading high-performance sales teams
  • Strong waste management experience (added advantage)
  • Persuasive, confident and assertive.
  • Must possess the ability to manage and develop business activity
  • Sound understanding of fundamental contractual issues
  • Able to develop and maintain relationships into the KZN Market
  • Good knowledge of applying Pricing strategy to tenders and contract renewals.

Apply via website or alternatively, via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
